comment: She is very understanding & wants to give you an A. Her class is very easy to follow & the workload isnt heavy at all! If you want an A i def would take her 10/10!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: 6 online exams covering 1-2 chapters; 6th exam (final) is NOT cumulative & optional; hw for each chapter; expects you to watch lecture videos before class; only goes over key slides/summarizes key topics in class; lots of opportunities for bonus points; good class attendance = more lenient; does zoom on Fridays; expect to read research papers

This has to be the worst professor at KSU. I had immunology with her. She treats a 4000 level biology course like a bio 1101 course. There are these stupid assignments, pop quizzes (I know... POP QUIZZES?!?!), stupidly long homework, annoying assignments. She is also very unorganized. Very Very easy A but trust me you do not want to take her. WORST

Take this Professorat whatever the cost, even if you have to wait until add/drop week. I took her for cell biology and immunology and she wants her students to succeed so she will give you everything to be successful

I currently have a 99% in her cell bio class which is online asynchronous. All tests and quizzes are online. You are guaranteed an A. Dont take anyone else. Pretty self explanatory as to why class is easy. Google is very good at explaining and super helpful as majority of the content and concepts can be found online. Tests are like the quizzes.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: EASIEST PROFESSOR EVER!!! Gives quizzes, and tests are VERY similar to the quizzes. Extremely caring and wants everyone to pass with an A!!! Even allows redos for exams to boost your grade if you got questions wrong on the test. SO SO SO CARING AND UNDERSTANDING
Really easy! Very nice person! Test similar to quizzes and not stressful at all
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: LOVE HER!!!! she understands that some students do not test well tests are not the heaviest portion of your grade. Her tests are similar to her quizzes and will have the same questions a lot of the time. She is SUPER nice and understanding. Def take her if you're thinking about it! She also has a project throughout the semester which is graded.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Lecture heavy
